page.title: 09ENTERTAINMENT I
page.content:
Ballycastle offers a wide range of entertainment to suit all tastes.There is a variety of clubs and bars where many of the local people and tourists meet together.A new amusement arcade has opened for the younger generation offering cheap entertainment in the form of slot machines and video games.
Disco's and dances are held in some of the bars and hotels.
Every year in the last week of August holiday makers flock to Ballycastle for the{Old Lammas Fair}.This is a market which has been held for hundreds of years and is famous for its{Dulse}- dried edible seaweed,and{ {Yellow Man}- yellow candy or drawn toffee.
